overview: In school, we learn to remember to live, but in life, we learn to forget to enrich living.  Frozen from the film-propaganda, Let the student study (1962), by Jean Manzon, made against the student movement in the pre-coup-d'etat context, a frame is photocopied, stretched and submerged in the cave of time.
title: 24(Twenty-Four) Burned Eyelashes
